text:
CURRICULUM VITAE
MANOJ SAINI
MOBILE: +91-9999776771
EMAIL –ManojsainiMJ@Outlook.com
CAREER OBJECTIVE  
To obtain the position of a Technical Support Networking (L1) in an organization
where, I can utilize my professional skills and experience towards the growth of
the  organization  and  make  use  of  my  extensive  knowledge  and  skills  and
synergize with the organization to focus on, and achieve, the long term goals that
have been put into place.  
PROFESSIONAL STRENGTHS   
Comprehensive knowledge of CISCO networking technologies and protocols.
Installing,  Configuration  &  Troubleshooting  recovery  up-gradation  &  back
schedule.
Skilled  in  designing,  planning  and  implementing  LAN/WAN  infrastructure,
routing protocol.
TECHNICAL SKILLS  
CCNA    (CISCO CERTIFIED NETWORK ASSOCIATE   )    training from  Network  Bulls,
Gurugram, Haryana.
Operating Systems Windows XP/98/7/8/ 
Software Microsoft  Outlook , Microsoft office suite
Routing  protocolsProtocols in OSI & TCP/IP model, Active Directory
IPV4 & IPV6 (sub netting)
OSPF & EIGRP  (load balancing equal and unequal) &
Ethernet
LAN/WANFrame  Relay,  IP  Routing,  HDLC,  ISDN,  VoIP,  RIP,
VPN, VLAN
 IP services Telnet, DHCP, DNS, SMTP, HTTPs
RESPONSIBILITY  
Installation  &  Configuration  of  Windows  OS  Xp,  Vista,  Windows7  etc  &
application software.
Troubleshooting of PC Problem (Hardware and Software).
Troubleshoot  &  solution  of  network  related  problems  also  internet  related
problems.
Resolve email configuration in Outlook & Express.
Managing with network essentials like Switches, Hubs, cables and connectors.Installation & Configure local printer on client PC’s and troubleshooting of
printer problem.
Install & Configure network printer on client PC’s through network.
Backup & Restore of mails, troubleshooting of mails related problems.
Creation of user accounts, modifying user properties & assigning rights to the
users
Join computers into domain.
EXPERIENCE:  
Directorate General: Doordarshan, Doordarshan Bhawan, Copernicus Marg, New
Delhi
Designation :Network Engineer
Time Period :1.2 Years
PROFESSIONAL QUALIFICATION   
Master Degree :M.C.A from M.D, University, Rohtak in (2011-2014) with
70.40% 
Bachelor Degree :B.C.A.  from  M.D,  University,  Rohtak  in  (2008-
2011) with 61.00%       
ACADEMIC QUALIFICATION  
Class XII :Passed from CBSE Board in 2008
Class X :Passed from CBSE Board in 2006 
     
STRENGTHS  
Punctual, willing to work in a competitive environment.
Self-confident, self-motivating and encouraging.
Result oriented, hardworking, convincing power.
Fast learner & team player.
PERSONAL DETAILS  
Father’s name :Shri. Ghanshyam 
Date of birth :06th March 1990
Sex :Male
Marital status :Unmarried
Nationality :Indian
Languages :Hindi & English
Permanent Address :H.No.-3718  G.F,  Sector-3,  Faridabad,
Haryana-121004
               
DECLARATION
